page.title: 06Fishing
page.content: There are fishing ponds near Swinster Lane. Pike and Bream can be caught there. Some of the ponds are private. Some of the ponds have recently been filled in and thr land used for farming. Some have been drained. Winter's Pond is the best you can buy bait, rods and floats there. Mr. Winters organises a local fishing match every year for the Bontoft cup. This cup is for sea fishing in the Humber Estuary. Cod, eels and plaice can be caught from the bank. There is also a casting competition every year. Pollution is increasing in the Humber caused by factories and ships. There have been serious oil spills. This may be damaging fish stocks.
